title: Lebanese Bank Hit With Civil Suit for Failing to Cash Check Following Financial Meltdown
description:
Société Générale de Banque au Liban, a major lender in the Middle East, is facing a civil lawsuit in the U.S. for refusing to cash a check owed to a Lebanese-American businessman.

In a legal complaint, Joseph Zoghaib claims the institution, known as SGBL, issued checks it “knew could not be honored...

title: Lebanon cracks down on cash transfers amid US push to cut Hezbollah funding
description:
Lebanon’s central bank announced Friday a series of new restrictions on money changers and transfer companies, in a move widely seen as a response to mounting US pressure to dismantle Hezbollah’s financial lifelines, AFP reported.

The decision comes days after a visiting American official declared ...

title: Under US pressure, Lebanon tightens screws on money transfers
description:
Lebanon announced on Friday that money changers and transfer companies must comply with stricter rules as the country faces heavy US pressure to regulate its cash economy and cut off Hezbollah funding.

The move comes days after a visiting US official said his country was determined to cut off Tehra...

title: Aoun calls on investors to return to Lebanon at conference
description:
Lebanon is seeking to attract foreign investors with the launch of the 'Beirut One' economic conference on Tuesday, as the new government seeks to stabilise the economy and increase transparency.

Key to this is rebuilding relations with Saudi Arabia, historically one of Lebanon's main financial bac...
